SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.epoch
Class Figure

java.lang.Object
  com.epoch.Figure
All Implemented Interfaces:
FigConstants, FormatConstants, XMLConstants
public class Figure
extends Object
implements FigConstants, XMLConstants

Refers to a single figure (structure, reaction or image) used by a question. Scope: UI, Session, Data. Sessions: QSet, HWSession.

Field Summary
 String addlData
          For REACTION figures, text above and below the arrow; for SYNTHESIS figures, reaction conditions; for JMOL figures, scripts and Javascript commands.
 String bufferedImage
          Holds the figure image in case of IMAGE; holds the image of molstruct in other cases.
 int figureId
          Unique ID of figure.
 String instantiatedMolstruct
          When the question is an R-group question and this figure's molecule contains R groups, front end populates this field with a student's particular instantiation of this figure.
 String molstruct
          String representation of molecule of this Figure for all types except IMAGE.
 int questionId
          Unique ID of question to which this figure belongs.
 int serialNo
          Sequence order in the question.
 int type
          Type of figure.

Field Detail

figureId

public int figureId
Unique ID of figure.

questionId

public int questionId
Unique ID of question to which this figure belongs.

serialNo

public int serialNo
Sequence order in the question. Not necessarily consecutive.

type

public int type
Type of figure.

molstruct

public String molstruct
String representation of molecule of this Figure for all types except IMAGE. May also contain appended data.

instantiatedMolstruct

public String instantiatedMolstruct
When the question is an R-group question and this figure's molecule contains R groups, front end populates this field with a student's particular instantiation of this figure.

addlData

public String addlData
For REACTION figures, text above and below the arrow; for SYNTHESIS figures, reaction conditions; for JMOL figures, scripts and Javascript commands.

bufferedImage

public String bufferedImage
Holds the figure image in case of IMAGE; holds the image of molstruct in other cases.

isUsablePreload

public boolean isUsablePreload()
Gets whether this figure is an IMAGE.

Returns:
true if this figure is NOT an image

getTag

Gets the XML tag for figures.

getFigureTypeIntValue

public int getFigureTypeIntValue(String figureType)
Converts database figure value to corresponding internal type value.

Parameters:
figureType - database value for type of figure
Returns:
internal value for type of figure

getDisplayData

public String[] getDisplayData()
Gets all the data required to display this figure.

Returns:
array of strings; length and values depend on figure type:
  • MOLECULE or MECHANISM: structure only;
  • REACTION: structure, text above arrow, text below arrow;
  • LEWIS: MOL value, MRV value for display;
  • SYNTHESIS: MRV value, reaction conditions;
  • JMOL: structure, Jmol scripts, Jmol Javascript commands;
  • IMAGE: image filename.

getDisplayData

public String[] getDisplayData(String rGroups)
Gets all the data required to display this figure with generic R groups replaced with instantiated R groups.

Parameters:
rGroups - specific R groups used to replace generic R groups in a figure; may be null
Returns:
array of strings; length and values depend on figure type:
  • MOLECULE or MECHANISM: structure only;
  • REACTION: structure, text above arrow, text below arrow;
  • LEWIS: MOL value, MRV value for display;
  • SYNTHESIS: MRV value, reaction conditions;
  • JMOL: structure, Jmol scripts, Jmol Javascript commands;
  • IMAGE: image filename.

getDisplayData

public String[] getDisplayData(String[] phrases)
Gets all the data required to display this synthesis figure.

Parameters:
phrases - translations of phrases "Reaction conditions", "ID numbers", and "No reactions chosen" in user's language
Returns:
array of strings; length and values depend on figure type:
  • MOLECULE or MECHANISM: structure only;
  • REACTION: structure, text above arrow, text below arrow;
  • LEWIS: MOL value, MRV value for display;
  • SYNTHESIS: MRV value, reaction conditions;
  • JMOL: structure, Jmol scripts, Jmol Javascript commands;
  • IMAGE: image filename.

getDisplayData

public String[] getDisplayData(String rGroups,
                               String[] phrases)
Gets all the data required to display this figure.

Parameters:
rGroups - specific R groups used to replace generic R groups in a figure; may be null
phrases - translations of phrases "Reaction conditions", "ID numbers", and "No reactions chosen" in user's language
Returns:
array of strings; length and values depend on figure type:
  • MOLECULE or MECHANISM: structure only;
  • REACTION: structure, text above arrow, text below arrow;
  • LEWIS: MRV value for display, MOL value;
  • SYNTHESIS: MRV value, reaction conditions;
  • JMOL: structure, Jmol scripts, Jmol Javascript commands;
  • IMAGE: image filename.
